subject: Affiliate Commission Rate
description_text:
Hi Simsonn Team,

I hope you are well and are having a good start to the new year! I was wondering if you could adjust my commission rate up to 12% now that I have surpassed $12,000 in sales.

I really appreciate it and I'm excited by the goals we are hitting together!

Kind regards,

Daragh Kennedy (MpowR)

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Daragh Kennedy,    Alright, we've adjusted your commission rate to 12%.
